DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Drug-drug Interaction Between LCZ696 Sildenafil Subjects With Mild Moderate Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct investigate potential pharmacokinetic drug-drug interaction patient mild-to-moderate hypertension support co-administration LCZ696 sildenafil .
DOC.criteria: Male subject mild moderate hypertension , either treat currently treatment , age 18 65 year age , otherwise good health determine past medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram , laboratory test screen .
